title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: The wife of controversial former Justice Minister Cho Kuk has been arrested after a local court issued an arrest warrant for the professor.The Seoul Central District Court's decision early Thursday on Chung Kyung-sim comes 58 days after the prosecution started a probe into Cho's family.The court said it was concerned evidence may be destroyed in light of the current investigation.She is alleged to have been involved in forging a college presidential citation in relation to her daughter's academic admission.Chung also faces allegations of embezzlement and capital market law violation for an over 850-thousand U.S. dollars private equity fund investment by herself and her two children.With this latest development, there's a high possibility the prosecution will be calling in her husband for questioning.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
